resources.string: Unable to connect to billing service. Sorry, but you won\'t be able to use the app.
Sorry, unable to check your subscription:\n%s
You haven\'t setup a server yet. Showing settings!

The only possible model of how to raise some money on the project so that I can invest some hours every month was a subscription model.

 So if you really love this app, subscribe and enjoy the app and regular updates!

 Please note that you have a 7 day trial period before you have pay anything!
